original_title: Sri Lanka raises petrol price from midnight
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka state run Ceylon Petroleum Corporation raised the price of 92 Octane petrol by 20 rupees to 348 rupees, effective from July 30 mid night.
Petrol Octane 95 was also increased by 10 rupees to 375 rupees a litre.
Super Diesel was increased by 12 rupees to 358 rupees per litre, but Auto Diesel was reduced by 2 rupees to 306 rupees.
Price of kerosene also was reduced by 10 rupees to 226 rupees. (Colombo/ August 01/2023)
